text: Neil Nongkynrih (9 July 1970 â€“ 5 January 2022) was an Indian pianist, songwriter and music educator. He was the founder, mentor, and conductor of Shillong Chamber Choir (SCC). He won the reality show India's Got Talent in 2010. He was awarded Padma Shri in 2015.Owe my Padma Shri to god: Shillong Chamber Choir founder, Business Standard Nongkynrih was born in Shillong, Meghalaya, India. Nongkynrih died on 5 January 2022 from problems caused by surgery at a hospital in Mumbai, India at the age of 51. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian musicians Category:Indian songwriters Category:Indian educators Category:Pianists Category:Conductors
title: Neil Nongkynrih
